description: Primes of the form n + sum_{i=1..n} i!.
comments: Indices that give primes: 1, 2, 4, 10. - _Michel Marcus_, Jan 06 2014a(5) corresponds to index 1006 and has 2586 decimal digits. - _Giovanni Resta_, Jan 06 2014a(6) corresponds to index 8180 and has 28457 decimal digits. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 08 2014
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = { for (n=1, nn, if (isprime(p = sum(i=1, n, i!) + n), print1(p, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 06 2014
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
